title: I Got a New Skill Every Time I Was Exiled, and After 100 Different Worlds, I Was Unmatched (WN) - Novel Updates
genre: Action   Adventure   Comedy   Fantasy   Mature   Romance   Shounen
tags: Academy   Adapted to Manga   Appearance Different from Actual Age   Beautiful Female Lead   Cautious Protagonist   Cheats   Clever Protagonist   Demi-Humans   Demon Lord   Elemental Magic   Elves   Fantasy World   Gods   Heroes   Magic   Magic Beasts   Male Protagonist   Mature Protagonist   Overpowered Protagonist   Pirates   R-15   Second Chance   Slow Romance   Spirit Users   Spirits   Strong Love Interests   Summoning Magic   Sword And Magic   Sword Wielder   Transported to Another World   World Hopping
author: Hinoura Takumi   日之浦拓
description:
A mysterious god-like entity has given Ed a crazy ordeal in which he must be expelled from a party of 100 heroes in 100 different worlds in order to return to his original world, but he finally achieves the condition and is able to return to his original world. However, as a final additional condition, he is given the chance to 'see what happens to the worlds he has been banished from.' ... This is where he learns a shocking fact.


'All right, I'll do it! I'll go there again and be banished for good all over again!'


Only this time he is accompanied to these 100 worlds by a former companion...


'Fufu~, don't worry! I'll be with you this time!'


'Yeah, I'm more worried. ...'>
